debug-properties-plus.screen.title: Debug Properties
debug-properties-plus.screen.warning: Debug properties exist for debugging purposes only. They might corrupt your world! Only change if you know what you are doing.
debug-properties-plus.screen.header.perW: Per world debug properties: (Defaults for new worlds)
debug-properties-plus.command.get: Debug property %s is currently set to: %s
debug-properties-plus.command.set: Debug property %s is now set to: %s
